languages.text: {n}Соломон стоит, заложив большие пальцы за ремень, по-хозяйски осматривая мостик. При вашем приближении он непринужденно кивает.{/n} "Приветствую, Вольный Торговец. Докладываю: провел первичную инспекцию верхних палуб с Глейто — список нарушений оказался на пять страниц короче ожидаемого. Начинаю опасаться, что служителю {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекса{/g} будет нечем заняться на вашем судне".

{n}Solomorne stands with both his thumbs in his belt, looking around the bridge with assertive confidence. He gives you a casual nod as you approach.{/n} "Greetings, Rogue Trader. I would like to report that Glaito and I have finished our initial inspection of the upper decks — the list of infractions ended up being five pages shorter than expected. I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the Lex might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは両手の親指をベルトにかけ、揺るぎない自信を漂わせながらブリッジを見渡していた。あなたが近づくと、彼は気軽にうなずいてみせた。{/n}「お疲れ様です、ローグトレーダー。ご報告いたします。グライトと私は上層デッキの初期点検を完了しました。違反のリストは、予想より5ページも短く収まりました。おかげで、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス{/g}の僕たる者としては、この船の中で暇を持て余すのではないかと心配になってきたところです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stands with both his thumbs in his belt, looking around the bridge with assertive confidence. He gives you a casual nod as you approach.{/n} "Greetings, Rogue Trader. I would like to report that Glaito and I have finished our initial inspection of the upper decks — the list of infractions ended up being five pages shorter than expected. I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは両手の親指をベルトにかけ、揺るぎない自信を漂わせながらブリッジを見渡していた。あなたが近づくと、彼は気軽にうなずいてみせた。{/n}「お疲れ様です、ローグトレーダー。ご報告いたします。グライトと私は上層デッキの初期点検を完了しました。違反のリストは、予想より5ページも短く収まりました。おかげで、レックスの僕たる者としては、この船の中で暇を持て余すのではないかと心配になってきたところです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hat beide Daumen in seinen Gürtel gehakt und sieht sich mit forschem Selbstvertrauen auf der Brücke um. Als du dich näherst, nickt er dir beiläufig zu.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich möchte berichten, dass Glaito und ich unsere erste Inspektion der oberen Decks abgeschlossen haben – die Liste der Verstöße war am Ende fünf Seiten kürzer als erwartet. Ich mache mir langsam Sorgen, dass ein Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} an Bord Eures Schiffes nicht allzu viel zu tun haben dürfte."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stands with both his thumbs in his belt, looking around the bridge with assertive confidence. He gives you a casual nod as you approach.{/n} "Greetings, Rogue Trader. I would like to report that Glaito and I have finished our initial inspection of the upper decks — the list of infractions ended up being five pages shorter than expected. I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

Als du dich näherst, nickt er dir beiläufig zu.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich möchte berichten, dass Glaito und ich unsere erste Inspektion der oberen Decks abgeschlossen haben – die Liste der Verstöße war am Ende fünf Seiten kürzer als erwartet. Ich mache mir langsam Sorgen, dass ein Diener des Lex an Bord Eures Schiffes nicht allzu viel zu tun haben dürfte."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne bombe fièrement le torse, ses pouces calés dans sa ceinture, balayant du regard la passerelle tout entière. Il vous adresse un hochement de tête assuré tandis que vous vous approchez.{/n} « Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je souhaitais vous signaler que Glaito et moi avions achevé notre inspection initiale des ponts supérieurs. La liste des infractions est étonnamment succincte, le rapport totalise donc cinq pages de moins que prévu. Je commence à penser qu'un serviteur de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} pourrait bien avoir peu de travail à bord de votre vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stands with both his thumbs in his belt, looking around the bridge with assertive confidence. He gives you a casual nod as you approach.{/n} "Greetings, Rogue Trader. I would like to report that Glaito and I have finished our initial inspection of the upper decks — the list of infractions ended up being five pages shorter than expected. I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne bombe fièrement le torse, ses pouces calés dans sa ceinture, balayant du regard la passerelle tout entière. Il vous adresse un hochement de tête assuré tandis que vous vous approchez.{/n} « Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je souhaitais vous signaler que Glaito et moi avions achevé notre inspection initiale des ponts supérieurs. La liste des infractions est étonnamment succincte, le rapport totalise donc cinq pages de moins que prévu. Je commence à penser qu'un serviteur de la Lex pourrait bien avoir peu de travail à bord de votre vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se planta con ambos pulgares en el cinturón y escudriña el puente con suma confianza. Te saluda asintiendo con la cabeza cuando te acercas.{/n} «Hola, Comerciante Independiente. Me complace comunicarle que Glaito y yo hemos finalizado la inspección preliminar de las cubiertas superiores; la lista de infracciones es cinco páginas más breve de lo que anticipábamos. Me preocupa que este siervo de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} tenga poca tarea a bordo de su nave».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stands with both his thumbs in his belt, looking around the bridge with assertive confidence. He gives you a casual nod as you approach.{/n} "Greetings, Rogue Trader. I would like to report that Glaito and I have finished our initial inspection of the upper decks — the list of infractions ended up being five pages shorter than expected. I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

Te saluda asintiendo con la cabeza cuando te acercas.{/n} «Hola, Comerciante Independiente. Me complace comunicarle que Glaito y yo hemos finalizado la inspección preliminar de las cubiertas superiores; la lista de infracciones es cinco páginas más breve de lo que anticipábamos. Me preocupa que este siervo de la Lex tenga poca tarea a bordo de su nave».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙站在那里，两根拇指搭在腰带上，以充满自信的目光环视着舰桥四周。当你走过来时，他向你漫不经意地点了点头。{/n}“向你致意，行商浪人。我想报告的是，我和格雷托已经完成了上层甲板的初步检查，违规事项清单比我的预期整整短了五页。这不禁让我开始担心，{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国律法{/g}的仆人在你的船上恐怕没有什么事情要做了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stands with both his thumbs in his belt, looking around the bridge with assertive confidence. He gives you a casual nod as you approach.{/n} "Greetings, Rogue Trader. I would like to report that Glaito and I have finished our initial inspection of the upper decks — the list of infractions ended up being five pages shorter than expected. I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙站在那里，两根拇指搭在腰带上，以充满自信的目光环视着舰桥四周。当你走过来时，他向你漫不经意地点了点头。{/n}“向你致意，行商浪人。我想报告的是，我和格雷托已经完成了上层甲板的初步检查，违规事项清单比我的预期整整短了五页。这不禁让我开始担心，帝国律法的仆人在你的船上恐怕没有什么事情要做了。”

languages.text: {n}Her iki başparmağı kemerinde olan Solomorne, iddialı bir öz güvenle köprüye bakıyor. Yaklaştığında sana başıyla alelade bir selam veriyor.{/n} "Merhaba Hür Tacir. Glaito'yla beraber üst güvertelerin ilk denetimini tamamladığımızı bildirmek isterim. İhlal listesi beklenenden beş sayfa daha kısa çıktı. {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g}'in hizmetkârlarından birinin sizin geminizde kendini meşgul edebileceği pek az şey bulabileceğinden endişelenmeye başlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stands with both his thumbs in his belt, looking around the bridge with assertive confidence. He gives you a casual nod as you approach.{/n} "Greetings, Rogue Trader. I would like to report that Glaito and I have finished our initial inspection of the upper decks — the list of infractions ended up being five pages shorter than expected. I'm beginning to worry that a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex{/g} might have little to occupy himself with aboard your ship."

Glaito'yla beraber üst güvertelerin ilk denetimini tamamladığımızı bildirmek isterim. İhlal listesi beklenenden beş sayfa daha kısa çıktı. Lex'in hizmetkârlarından birinin sizin geminizde kendini meşgul edebileceği pek az şey bulabileceğinden endişelenmeye başlıyorum."
